product_name: Serengeti Bella Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring sleek, feminine style plus polarized, photochromic lenses that shield eyes from sun and glare, the women's Serengeti Bella polarized sunglasses are ideal for all your on-the-go adventures. Photochromic lenses automatically adjust tint according to light conditions; lenses darken in bright light and lighten when there's less light. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight, durable nylon frames are built to withstand everyday use. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring sleek, feminine style plus polarized, photochromic lenses that shield eyes from sun and glare, the women's Serengeti Bella polarized sunglasses are ideal for all your on-the-go adventures.
